wikipedia_page.main:
John Patrick Croxall  (born 19 January 1946 Birmingham) is a British biologist, and was Head of Conservation Biology at the British Antarctic Survey.
He is Chair of Global Seabird Programme, of BirdLife International.

response: *Professor John Patrick Croxall, Head, Conservation Biology, British Antarctic Survey. For services to Ornithology.
